H0.text: What year did the cable television network ESPN made its debut broadcasting and producing sports-related programming 24 hours a day. 1980

H1.text: What year did the cable television network ESPN made its debut broadcasting and producing sports-related programming 24 hours a day. 1982

H2.text: What year did the cable television network ESPN made its debut broadcasting and producing sports-related programming 24 hours a day. 1977

H3.text: What year did the cable television network ESPN made its debut broadcasting and producing sports-related programming 24 hours a day. 1979

A4.text: ESPN launched on September 7, 1979, beginning with the first telecast of what would become the channel's flagship program, SportsCenter.

A5.text: It was founded on September 7, 1979 by Bill Rasmussen, Scott Rasmussen and Ed Eagan.
